info.name: Facebook Remove All Clutter + Right Sidebar
info.description: Removes the right sidebar (because it's filled with so much unnecessary stuff), "Your Games" and "Suggested Games" in the chat sidebar, as well as the sidebar sections Apps, Interests, Developer, and Events.
info.additionalInfo:
Version 1.1

Change Log:
Unknown date // Tidied up coding, currently working on fixing missing years in profile/activity log and removing sponsored posts.
08/08/2015 // Added coding to remove "Donate" popups on news feed.
